entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
